Mike Anserson's Polygraph Examinations

Polygraph examinations vary greatly based on each case. Mike uses the high quality LX4000 computer polygraph system. This systems records, stores and analyzes physiological changes during the polygraph examination. The LX4000 system combines conventional procedure with a sophisticated state of the art computer.

Your examination will be audio and video recorded. Each examination is done by Mike Anderson and 100% confidential.

Fees for Polygraph services change are greatly as the cases do.

For more information, you can contact Mike Anderson and his team. Contact Us.

LOGO

VPI

VPI offers polygraph services to the public as well as to law enforcement agencies. VPI also offers private Investigative Services to the public.

Polygraph:

An instrument for receiving and recording simultaneously tracings of variations in certain body activities.
